title: Research and Markets: Papua New Guinea Oil and Gas Exploration and Production Analysis and Outlook to 2025
text:
Related Content 
DUBLIN--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/5f94fk/papua_new_guinea ) has announced the addition of the "Papua New Guinea Oil and Gas Exploration and Production Analysis and Outlook to 2025 - Blocks, Fields, Production Outlook, SWOT, Companies and Market Structure of Papua New Guinea Upstream" report to their offering. 
Papua New Guinea upstream oil and gas analysis and outlook report provides complete information on Papua New Guinea exploration and production blocks, fields, companies and future prospects. Details of the industry growth in the historic period coupled with future growth prospects are provided in detail. 
Papua New Guinea oil and gas reserves, replacement ratios, proven volumes along with detailed insights into the role of Papua New Guinea in region and global upstream markets are provided in detail. Further, complete infrastructure details of Papua New Guinea field wise production, field by field details, exploration blocks on offer, available blocks and existing block details in Papua New Guinea are provided in the research work. 
Field wise production in Papua New Guinea and company wise production are provided historically for each year between 2005 and 2012. Further, Papua New Guinea upstream E&P market structure of the industry based on oil and gas production for leading companies is also provided in the report. 
Business profiles of three leading oil and gas producing companies in Papua New Guinea along with their business description, strategies, SWOT and Financial details are included. Further, all major industry updates and their impact on the Papua New Guinea oil and gas EP industry are analyzed in the report. 
Key Topics Covered: 
2 Introduction to Papua New Guinea Upstream Oil and Gas Markets 
3 Importance of Papua New Guinea Upstream Market in Region and Global Front 
4 Key Trends, Market Drivers and Challenges Facing Companies in Papua New Guinea Upstream Sector 
5 Papua New Guinea Oil and Gas production and consumption forecasts to 2025 
6 Papua New Guinea Oil and Gas Field Details 
7 Papua New Guinea Field wise Oil and Gas Production, 2005-2012 
8 Papua New Guinea Exploration Sector Analysis 
9 Papua New Guinea Exploration and Production Market Competitive Landscape 
For more information visit http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/5f94fk/papua_new_guinea View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150729006464/en/ Contact:
